cyclic_aging.description: Marginal cost of discharging 1 kWh from different SOC segments, based on a power-law model (b=2) and a 100% DoD cycle life of 3840 cycles.
cyclic_aging.num_segments_note: Array length determines number of segments. 6 segments (current) = 40% fewer binaries, 2-3x faster solve. 10 segments (commented below) = higher accuracy.

calendar_aging.description: Breakpoints for the piecewise-linear calendar aging cost function (SOS2), derived from Collath et al. (2023).

alpha_sweep.description: Alpha parameter sweep configuration for meta-optimization

optimization_notes.require_sequential_segment_activation: Setting to false disables charge/discharge activation binaries to improve solve speed
optimization_notes.lifo_epsilon_kwh: Tolerance for LIFO fullness constraint. Larger value = faster solve (larger feasible region). 5 kWh = ~1.1% of segment capacity
optimization_notes.performance: With enforce_segment_binary=false and epsilon=5.0, expect 3-5x speedup vs strict binary enforcement
